document.title: Kentucky Academic Standards Arts and Humanities: Theatre

378F13F9F7F643D9A4B2560BCA9ADB0B.description: With prompting and support, tell a short story in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

30626F8F4B8D45AE8EFFDE8646DE13E6.description: With prompting and support, identify stories that are different from one another in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

190E4ACA09EE4910AFFDFF5767C4BCD8.description: With prompting and support, identify skills and knowledge from other areas in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

D2DAC374B3224CCD90733156B0C587AA.description: Relate artistic ideas and works with societal, cultural and historical context to deepen understanding.

E4C165D01BCD4505893961DC9EEFF8C5.description: With prompting and support, identify similarities between characters and oneself in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

4E65E2FF4E1F41A0B6EF099013D6B995.description: Synthesize and relate knowledge and personal experiences to make art.

3747112D92B447FFB20E76E613BEDBD7.description: With prompting and support, actively engage with others in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

3830427EF351432C857E559CDEF2BB6A.description: Apply criteria to evaluate artistic work.

615EC6C23BC9470BA122E7EF09E04F37.description: With prompting and support, name and describe settings in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

85376C449BD3458BB3ED218B3BFA18B2.description: With prompting and support, identify preferences in dramatic play, a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama), or ageappropriate theatre performance.

463A711403724C54A8AD5DA4C809DFCA.description: Interpret intent and meaning in artistic work.

38418FD2579A496FAEE7AB22210217A6.description: With prompting and support, express an emotional response to characters in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

074F9E44505D4CCE97B548A3248BA2E1.description: With prompting and support, use voice and sound in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

88B2D0BECA8349D2BAE8F37A081A844F.description: Convey meaning through the presentation of artistic work.

A574D94DBB5745A3B96A2C75E53A0A5B.description: With prompting and support, explore and experiment with various technical elements in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

E5CC11EF74A34D0EBBAA4E19F42BDDA1.description: With prompting and support, understand that voice and sound are fundamental to dramatic play and guided drama experiences (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

3E08E6705B3A4CAEB11F50DE1A3BB16F.description: Develop and refine artistic technique and work for presentation.

FDF04EE2699545FEBA8117793FD04116.description: With prompting and support, identify characters and setting in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

2652B6A8F110439C975936CC75D1C60E.description: Select, analyze, and interpret artistic work for presentation.

5AA9116E788D4B929FE0CA6F09B1C5BC.description: With prompting and support, ask and answer questions in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

F6757AA6967D449A9AA036A6E05B09A2.description: With prompting and support, express original ideas in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., creative drama, process drama, story drama).

58EDE4BC44DF448490BB0BFF8D04CCA7.description: With prompting and support, interact with peers and contribute to dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

6E6EFFF1C0E64137888206E33868ACBD.description: Organize and develop artistic ideas and work.

D4F7996006914CBCBDA95CDB6CD81321.description: With prompting and support, use nonrepresentational materials to create props, puppets, and costume pieces for dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

B8738730B7B44AA7BFE025F5B31CB298.description: With prompting and support, invent and inhabit an imaginary elsewhere in dramatic play or a guided drama experience (e.g., process drama, story drama, creative drama).

178A44EFAC7F4EED84C0FFE0373EE69A.description: Generate and conceptualize artistic ideas and work.
